message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair play!
I think I deserve a bit more, Alice. How about 60-40?
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I think 60-40 is a fair compromise considering the inflation. What do you think?
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your last offer. 55-45 seems fair to me.
